availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Indiana Simmons Clark in Rutherford County, Tennessee, on January 22, 1845. Father of Martha A. Clark, Nancy A. Clark, and William A. Clark. Farmer in Hickman County, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Hickman County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Clinton, p. 504.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Clinton, p. 200A.
Tennessee State Marriages, 1780-2002, Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, TN, Rutherford County, 1804 - 1881: Marriages 3, p. 101.
KYR-0001-020-0183.
